extendedInfo.description: Listen to SMS, listen to email, listen to TXT messages. DriveSafelyÂ® reads text messages, SMS and emails aloud and lets you respond by voice (with Pro). iSpeech Text to Speech (TTS) will speak your SMS while driving. Hands-free. Hear SMS, Hear TXTs, Hear Emails, Hear text messages read aloud. Spoken SMS text to speech audio

reviews.title: Nice, but can\'t reply or purchase pro
reviews.comment: This is a nice app.  The problem is, you can\'t reply with your spoken voice with the free version. And with my Galaxy S, the button to upgrade to the paid version doesn\'t do anything, so you can\'t purchase the paid version even if you wanted to.
reviews.author: Steve OC CA

reviews.title: Pro doesn\'t work on Galaxy SIII
reviews.comment: I purchased premium version for the reply function but every time I try and use the reply feature the app crashes. Fix or offer a refund.
reviews.author: Joseph Martinez-Williams

reviews.title: Much better on Blackberry
reviews.comment: This version does not turn on as soon as I turn on bluetooth. Every 15  or so minutes minutes it repeats the it\'s turned on. No comparison to the BB version.
reviews.author: Jp Michaels

reviews.title: BB Version is Better
reviews.comment: I used to have this on my blackberry and it was great. Now on my note2, not so much. Doesn\'t turn on automatically with bluetooth, even though it\'s programed to, and lags when trying to read text messages. Update and I may reconsider.
reviews.author: Matt Colleps

reviews.title: Crashes on GS3
reviews.comment: Purchased the full version for 9.99. The app crashes every time I try to reply to a text. There is no option to receive a refund. Complete rip off!
reviews.author: Bobby Ping

reviews.title: Cool app but.
reviews.comment: Not working with Note 2.3.6 no root.   Sometimes I get \"messages from\" but it\'s 50/50.   Hoping for update
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap app. horrible customer service
reviews.comment: I downloaded the free version to see how I like  the app. I like the concept and was curious about the voice command to respond to text but not available in free version so I paid for pro version. app continually crashed and never worked right after that. Contacted I speech and they were very rude and basically told me its my problem no refunds.
reviews.author: Sandy Haynes

reviews.title: No Bluetooth
reviews.comment: Didn\'t connect via bluetooth & I could hardly hear it when it did work. It\'s a good idea but rarely works right.
reviews.author: Glen Figuracion

reviews.title: Support life?
reviews.comment: Like many have mentioned, this app was amazing a few years back. Now it\'s got issues that according to their support forum, they\'ve known and are \"addressing\" it about for what now is one month short of a year... please let us enjoy safer driving especially for those that have paid for it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Used to love it!
reviews.comment: The widget is a must because it is one-click on/off, but no longer works :( Emailed developer, said all I can hope is it will be fixed on a future update.  That was 6 months ago. Tired of having to press 3-4 different items (that\'s all time eyes are away from the road) if I forget to start it before I start driving. Loved this app, but looking for alternatives now.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what it says on the tin
reviews.comment: I love the way it turns on when I put the phone in the car dock. It lets my texters know that no matter how urgent their message is I\'m not going to risk my life to read it
reviews.author: Tim Spellman

reviews.title: Its okay
reviews.comment: It only reads 25 words and it doesn\'t work 3 out of 10 times on average, kind of unreliable... not the best,so I would keep looking.
reviews.author: Laura Nelson

reviews.title: Pure Junk
reviews.comment: Does not activate on connection. Does not read over bluetooth. Buying pro does not fix anything just puts you out of pocket, just read the angry responses form those who paid and the vender won\'t give a refund. I have contacted google yet it still says it is compatible with my device! News flash, it doesn\'t work with Jelly Bean Google. Google should remove this from play, esp the pay one since it doesn\'t work and the vendor does not refund. Now that I have worked around Play store I feel moving from Blackberry to Android was a mistake. BB app world was simple, if it was there it worked. Get it together!!
reviews.author: Tony Keith

reviews.title: I want a refund
reviews.comment: Crashes at every text on GS4. I want my money back.  How do I get a refund????
reviews.author: Chris Rollins

reviews.title: POS
reviews.comment: Worked on my BB then stopped working on my G2. Installed on my S3 and same problem, will not read sms (did not attempt mail)
reviews.author: John Strange

reviews.title: Ewww!
reviews.comment: This app sucks didn\'t work good with my blk berry now dont work at all with my galaxy note!!! I even purchased the pro and still didn\'t work right wont give a refund (SUCKS)
reviews.author: Frank Oliver

reviews.title: Great app!
reviews.comment: Slight delay on reading emails. Otherwise, as advertised. Will give it a week before I decide on upgrade
reviews.author: Kris Willison

reviews.title: Sketchy
reviews.comment: Seems nice but its a little sketchy that it immediately tries to send a random text message to a shortcode as soon as its installed. Those with older versions of Android without that notification wouldn\'t even know this app is doing that...  Widget doesn\'t seem to actually do anything.
reviews.author: Kacy Martin

reviews.title: Samsung Galaxy Note II (jellybean 2.1.2) paid app version
reviews.comment: Stopped working on the Note a while back..for quite a while now...text and email.  I went to turn it on the other day and noticed it had been on for a month probably with no response.  Turn it on and off and the texts work for a few days and then quit.  No email.   Crashes quite frequently these days, also. Until recently (on HTC G2 running gingerbread) best app ever and worked flawlessly for years.
reviews.author: David Taylor

reviews.title: Not so good. I like it tho
reviews.comment: My text are coming thru. I hear the voice. Not receiving them or pictures with this app. Please fix it. Thanks
reviews.author: Lisa Spence
